hyperspace_between_stars_research.description: research required to travel between stars

wormhole_research.description: research required to travel through wormholes

market_weight.description: higher values will cause galaxy generator use this npc over other npcs for this market
higher values will cause galaxy generator use this npc over other npcs for this market

fleet_attack_timeout_duration_in_minutes.description: throttle fleets from attacking too aggresively

fleet_colonize_timeout_duration_in_minut.description: throttle fleets from colonizing too aggresively

max_jumps_from_home_planet_for_fleets.description: restrict how far from home planet fleets will move

max_supply_percentage_relative_to_human_.description: prevent ai from getting more supply than human players [0-1]

will_fleet_retreat.description: if false fleets will never retreat from battle even if losing. default=true
